description: This Dart source file defines a function to select and initialize a data source based on an environment variable. It imports data source implementations and uses the dotenv package to determine runtime configuration, choosing between in-memory and SQLite data sources.

methods.name: selectDataSource
methods.description: Asynchronously selects and initializes a DataSource implementation based on the 'DATA_SOURCE' environment variable, defaulting to LocalSqliteDataSource if unset or unrecognized.
